thorwin.math.geo

Class Line2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • thorwin.math.geo.Line2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Line2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A line in 2-dimensional space.

      • intersect

        public java.util.Optional<Vector2D> intersect(Line2D line)
        Calculate the intersection point between this line and another. Parallel lines have no intersection.
        Parameters:
        line - other line
        Returns:
        intersection point, if any

      • intersect

        public static java.util.Optional<Vector2D> intersect(double x1,
                                                     double y1,
                                                     double x2,
                                                     double y2,
                                                     double x3,
                                                     double y3,
                                                     double x4,
                                                     double y4)
        Calculates intersection of lines (x1,y2),(x2,y2) and (x3,y3),(x4,y4). Parallel lines do not intersect.
        Parameters:
        x1 - line 1, reference point 1, x
        y1 - line 1, reference point 1, y
        x2 - line 1, reference point 2, x
        y2 - line 1, reference point 2, y
        x3 - line 2, reference point 1, x
        y3 - line 2, reference point 1, y
        x4 - line 2, reference point 2, x
        y4 - line 2, reference point 2, y
        Returns:
        the intersection point if any.

      • intersect

        Parameters:
        segment - other segment
        Returns:
        intersection, if any

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Line2D line)
        Determines if this line intersects with another. The line will not intersect if they are parallel.
        Parameters:
        line - other line
        Returns:
        true if there is an intersection

      • intersects

        public static boolean intersects(double x1,
                                 double y1,
                                 double x2,
                                 double y2,
                                 double x3,
                                 double y3,
                                 double x4,
                                 double y4)
        Determines if there is an intersection between lines (x1,y2),(x2,y2) and (x3,y3),(x4,y4).
        Parameters:
        x1 - line 1, reference point 1, x
        y1 - line 1, reference point 1, y
        x2 - line 1, reference point 2, x
        y2 - line 1, reference point 2, y
        x3 - line 2, reference point 1, x
        y3 - line 2, reference point 1, y
        x4 - line 2, reference point 2, x
        y4 - line 2, reference point 2, y
        Returns:
        true if the lines intersect.

      • intersects

        segment - segment
        Returns:
        true if the line intersects with the segment
